about_the_game:
When a robot-commanding alien heartthrob kidnaps Karen’s adorable kitten Chubbz, Karen has no choice but to grab a laser blaster, put on her favourite neon jacket, and start kicking robot butt. Super Crush KO is a brawler with heart, intrigue, and The Cutest Cat In The Universe.

Originally released January 16, 2020

Album composed and produced by Robby Duguay
Soundtrack for Super Crush KO from Vertex Pop
Album Art by Saffron Aurora

In Loving Memory of Brooke Mae Duguay ❤
detailed_description:
When a robot-commanding alien heartthrob kidnaps Karen’s adorable kitten Chubbz, Karen has no choice but to grab a laser blaster, put on her favourite neon jacket, and start kicking robot butt. Super Crush KO is a brawler with heart, intrigue, and The Cutest Cat In The Universe.

Originally released January 16, 2020

Album composed and produced by Robby Duguay
Soundtrack for Super Crush KO from Vertex Pop
Album Art by Saffron Aurora

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 393 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: MP3, FLAC, and WAV available

short_description: Thirteen tracks of original electronic music, composed and produced by Robby Duguay for Vertex Pop's game Super Crush KO.
